data.message: MCP Async/Background Processing (2025-11-25 spec): 1) Tasks primitive allows "call-now, fetch-later" with states: working, input_required, completed, failed, cancelled. 2) FastMCP uses Docket (from Prefect) for background tasks - add task=True to decorators. 3) MCP cron servers: mcp-cron, scheduler-mcp (supports shell commands, API calls, AI tasks, notifications with cron expressions). 4) OAuth client-credentials now supports cron jobs and agent-to-agent setups.
